alert.note: Alert for Potter; Randall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 4:54AM CDT until May 31 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Randall County in the Panhandle of Texas... Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 600 AM CDT. * At 453 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bushland, or 12 miles west of Amarillo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Canyon, Lake Tanglewood, Mescalero Park, Bushland, Valley De Oro, Umbarger, Palo Duro Canyon and Timbercreek Canyon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
